entry.title: Talks to End Ukraine War Pause as Russia's Offensive Intensifies
entry.content: Diplomatic efforts to end Russiaâ€™s war in Ukraine showed no signs of progress as fighting for the capital intensified, with Russian missiles destroying an aircraft factory and apartment building in Kyiv and a television tower in the western city of Rivne.

entry.title: Russians Kill Civilians, Loot for Supplies in Occupied Ukraine, Residents Say
entry.content: Locals described hungry and undisciplined Russian troops shooting civilians, breaking into supermarkets and shops, and raiding homes in search of food and valuables as their own supply lines have failed.
